page.title: 14LIFE STYLES IN M.W./SHIPT.
page.content: The older generation in the area are very conservative in their life styles. The area is predominantly rural and is regarded as a safe conservative seat. The M.P., Sir Paul Bryant, has a large majority. The main form of recreation in the area would be a night out at the pub or social club for these people. some couples dine out, but they tend to go out of the area. There is very little night life activity for young people. Motor bikes are popular, as is the dress which accompanies it. Teenage girls wear make-up, but few boys do. In dress sense, anything goes among youngsters.
